import createApiInstance from "api/api"; import axios from "axios"; import { AuthContext } from "contexts/AuthContext"; import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; // components export default function CardAddPatient() { const [showAlert, setShowAlert] = useState(false); const [alertType, setAlertType] = useState("success"); // 'success' ou 'error' const [alertMessage, setAlertMessage] = useState(""); const { token } = useContext(AuthContext); const apiInstance = createApiInstance(token); const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ email: "", nom: "", prenom: "", date_de_naissance: "", sexe: "Male", type_patient: "provisoire", cin: "", photo_cin: "", telephone: "", ville: "", mutuelle: "CNSS", }); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setUserData({ ...userData, [name]: value, }); }; const handleTypePatientChange = (event) => { setUserData({ ...userData, type_patient: event.target.value, }); }; const handleSexeChange = (event) => { setUserData({ ...userData, sexe: event.target.value, }); }; const handlePhotoCINUpload = (event) => { // Add code to handle photo_cin upload and store the URL in userData.photo_cin // You may use FileReader API or any library like react-dropzone for this. // For simplicity, I'll assume you have already implemented this functionality. }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); apiInstance .post("/api/patients/", userData) .then((response) => { console.log("Patient added successfully:", response.data); // Ajoutez ici le code pour gérer la réponse de l'API si nécessaire. setShowAlert(true); setAlertType("success"); setAlertMessage("Patient added successfully."); }) .catch((error) => { console.error("Error adding patient:", error); // Ajoutez ici le code pour gérer les erreurs si nécessaire. setShowAlert(true); setAlertType("error"); setAlertMessage("Error adding patient. Please try again."); }); }; return ( <>
